name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I bring expertise in **TypeScript**, **Python**, and building robust applications using frameworks such as **Express.js**, **NestJS**, and **React**. My background in developing RESTful APIs and GraphQL solutions, coupled with proficiency in databases like **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, enables me to create high-performing and scalable solutions.

I excel in integrating modern technologies to drive innovation, particularly in the realm of Generative AI (GenAI), and I have significant experience in Cloud services, implementing DevOps best practices to automate and streamline development workflows. My hands-on experience extends to building microservices and event-driven systems, ensuring seamless deployment via CI/CD processes.

Additionally, I have a strong foundation in coaching and mentoring teams, fostering a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment. My commitment to delivering high-quality solutions is reflected in my deep understanding of compliance standards and automation strategies.
